card.name: Accessory Viper SIC B 1B Creature - Snake 2/1 2 Deathtouch Nap - You may choose not to untap CARDNAME during your untap step. At the beginning of your upkeep, if CARDNAME is tapped, target creature you control gains deathtouch until end of turn.

-3: Return target instant or sorcery from your graveyard to your hand. You may deal damage equal to its converted mana cost to up to one target creature.
